attributes.action: Make Phillip Schofield the face of the New £20 note.
attributes.background: Phillip Schofield is a national treasure and deserves his face to be touched by everyones hands & rubbed in many back pockets. Vote our silver fox to be on the new £20 note. Lets make this happen!

rejection.details:
Bank notes are the responsibility of the Bank of England, which is independent of the Government and Parliament.

You can find out how the Bank decides who will be on bank notes here:

http://www.bankofengland.co.uk/banknotes/Pages/characters/selection.aspx
